abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column compares mobile applications that purport to offer inspiration for users who are stuck on a problem or in creative rut; notes that Windows document sharing app Delve is now available for non-Windows phones.
lead_paragraph: Stuck on a problem? Trapped in a rut? Here are a few apps to get your creativity flowing again.

headline.main: Video Feature: Apps to Kindle the Imagination

snippet: Stuck on a problem? Trapped in a rut? Here are a few apps to get your creativity flowing again.
